verses.1: Tua zawh ni tawm khat khit ciangin Kapernaum khua ah Jesu hong paikik a, inn ah a omna thu hong kitheithang hi.
verses.2: Mi tampi tak hong kikhawm uh ahih manin inn sung khempeuh, kongkhak pualam nangawn ah mi a dim hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah Pasianʼ thu hilhin a om laitakin,
verses.3: mihing li in Jesu kiangah khutlekhe zaw mi khat a paipih dingin hong pua uh hi.
verses.4: Ahi zongin mihonpi kineh lua ahih manin Jesu kiangah paipih thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuʼ omna san inn tungkhum hong letin, a lupna pheek tawh a mipa a khai suk uh hi.
verses.5: Jesu in hih miteʼ up mahmahna thu a muh ciangin khutlekhe zaw mipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak hi,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua lai ah a om, Thukham hilh siate pawl khat in a lungsim sung uh ah,
verses.7: “Bang hangin hih mipa, Pasian tawh a kikim bangin kingaihsunin hih bangin pau ngam ahi hiam? Pasian sim loh kuamah in mawhna maisak thei lo hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.8: Jesu in a lungsim sung uh a amau ngaihsutna thei pah ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin tua bangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
verses.9: Hih khutlekhe zaw mipa kiangah, ‘Na mawhna hong kimaisak khin hi,’ cih ding le, ‘Tho-in na lupna pheek la inla pai dih in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam?
verses.10: Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitungah mawhmaisak theih nading thu nei hi, ci-in na theih nadingun kong lak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih manin khutlekhe zaw mipa kiangah,
verses.11: “Tho-in na lupna pheek la inla, na inn ah ciah in,” a ci hi.
verses.12: Tua mipa zong amaute khempeuhʼ muhin tho a, a lupna pheek la-in a paikhia pah hi. Amaute khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, Pasian phatin, “Hih bang mahmah i mu ngei nai het kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin Galilee Tuili gei ah Jesu a paikik hi. Ama kiangah mihonpi hong pai uh a, Jesu in tua mihonte thu a hilh hi.
verses.14: Tua bangin a paina ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdonna zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Jesuʼ nung a zui pah hi.
verses.15: Tua nung ciangin Jesu in Leviʼ inn ah an a va ne hi. Siahdong mi tampi le thukham a khial mi tampite in Jesu zui uh a, amaute tampi in Jesu le a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uh hi.
verses.16: Hih thukham khialte le siahdongte tawh Jesu in an a nekkhopna Farisi mite sung panin Thukham hilh siate pawl khat in a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bang mite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
verses.17: Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Tua hun laitakin Tuiphumpa Johanʼ nungzuite le Farisi mite in an a tang uh hi. Jesu kiangah mi pawl khat hong pai-in, “Bang hangin Tuiphumpa Johanʼ nungzuite le Farisi miteʼ nungzuite in an tang uh a, nangma nungzuite in tang lo se ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
verses.19: Jesu in, “Mopawi a siim mite in an ne lo dingin um na hi uh hiam? Zineipa tawh a om khawm sung uh an ne loin om lo ding uh hi.
verses.20: Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiat pih hun hong tung dinga, tua hun a tun ciangin an ne loin a om ding uh hi.
verses.21: “Kuamah in puan tungsilh lui phop nadingin a ton nai lo puan bek a thak zang ngei lo hi. Zang zenzen leh a puan bek thak in a puan lui bal kek dinga, a vang gol zawsop ding hi.
verses.22: Kuamah in savun um lui sungah leenggahzu a thak thun ngei lo hi. Thun zenzen leh leenggahzu in savun um phukham dinga, a leenggahzu le a savun um, a nih tuakin a kisia suak ding hi. Tua ahih manin leenggahzu thak koih nadingin savun um thak kizang hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.23: Khat vei, Sabbath ni khatin Jesu le a nungzuite, mangbuh lo nawkin a pai uh hi. A paikawmun a nungzuite in mangbuhvui a zut uh hi.
verses.24: Tua ahih ciangin Farisi mite in Jesu kiangah, “Bang hangin Sabbath ni-in gamtat loh dingpi, na nungzuite gamta uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.25: Jesu in, “David in annek ding a kisap laitakin a gamtatna thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam? Amah le a mite a gilkial uh hi.
verses.26: Tua ahih ciangin Pasianʼ biakinn sungah lutin Pasian biakna-a a kipia anlumte a ne uh hi. Abiathar in siampi lianpen a sep laitakin hih thu piang hi. I Thukham tawh kizui-in ci lehang, hih anlumte pen siampite bek in a nek theih ding hi napi-in David in ne-in, a mite nangawn a pia lai hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.27: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Sabbath ni, mihingteʼ phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi a, mihing pen Sabbath ni a phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi lo hi.
verses.28: Tua ahih ciangin Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni nangawn a ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a thugen a khum hi.
